Package sg.edu.ntu.cz2002.grp3.Controller

Class StudentController

java.lang.Object
sg.edu.ntu.cz2002.grp3.Controller.StudentController
public class StudentController
extends java.lang.Object
The Class StudentController handles the logic for the options selected in student view, which includes adding, changing, dropping indexes, checking vacancies, and more.
Author:
Guat Kwan, Wei Xing, Ashton, Yi Bai, Zhe Ming

      public int addIndexToStudent​(java.lang.String indexCode)
      Adds the index to student.
      Parameters:
      indexCode - the index code
      Returns:
      -20: index not found, -22: student has the course already 1: success

    • changeIndex

      public int changeIndex​(int oldIndexPos, int newIndexPos)
      Parameters:
      oldIndexPos - the old index pos
      newIndexPos - the new index pos
      Returns:
      1: success | 0: Clash | -1: oldIndex not in the same course as new index. -2: no vacancy in new index

    • getStudentDetails

    • swopIndex

      public int swopIndex​(java.lang.String targetMatricNum, java.lang.String targetPassword, int indexPos)
      Swop index.
      Parameters:
      targetMatricNum - the target matric num
      targetPassword - the target password
      indexPos - the index pos
      Returns:
      -20: The matric number is invalid | -21: Invalid password | -22: partner has not registered for course. -23: Index clash with student timetable | =24: Index clashes with partner timetable | -25 Both have same index. 1: swop successful.

    • getCourseIndexesForPrinting
